cause.description:
Students4Seniors is a volunteer organization established and operated by students, and supervised by a parent board. Since more and more people are living longer and want to continue to live in their own homes, we help out seniors in "little" ways.
We will... -provide books, videos, and music -teach you how to use a computer and the internet -send cards and notes -run errands such as grocery shopping or returning library books -play cards and board games -walk the dog -provide companionship
Students attend a wide variety of Bay Area high-schools and provide their services for free! The students are bright, enthusiastic, trustworthy, and committed to helping seniors. Our program, Students4Seniors, is administered through an already established non-profit organization, Senior Affordable Housing of the West, Inc. (SAHOW). SAHOW was formed as a 501 (c) 3 with a mandate to provide affordable housing for seniors.
1. To connect different generations
2. To help seniors live a happy independent life
cause.mission: help seniors who are living independently
